name: There Is No Escape (SquidyDev)
description:
There is no escape is a short horror game about backrooms.

The game features 2 levels and 2 entity.

Since the game uses procedural generation in some levels there might be performance issues or crashes.

The game is in an early stage of developpement for now and some updates are planned however there is no plan what so ever to bring this game to a full release for now.

Feel free to share your feedbacks or idea in the comment section
